headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now. No engine anti-ice operations are currently flagged. Across base airports: 6 critical, 11 high, 13 medium, 9 normal. Key bases needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) and Chişinău (RMO/LUKK); plus 14 other bases. 13 additional base airports are at medium severity and should be monitored closely. At base airports, the dominant pattern is snow-related runway contamination risk, mist and low cloud base  — most notably around Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD). Network hotspots: Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD), Lublin (LUZ/EPLB), Modlin (WMI/EPMO) and 6 others. Primary drivers: low cloud base, mist and snow / blowing snow. Expected impact is reduced runway capacity with higher delay and diversion risk, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 1 airports changed status, led by Almaty (ALA/UAAA).
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 11 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: cloud base around 600 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — CRIT: fog; visibility down to 600 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties and 11 others. Worst affected now: Hamburg Helmut Schmidt (HAM/EDDH) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, low ceilings) | Billund (BLL/EKBI) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) | Gdańsk Lech Wałęsa (GDN/EPGD) — CRIT: freezing fog; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, cold-temperature performance penalties, very low visibility) | Lublin (LUZ/EPLB) — CRIT: mist; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: approach minima limits, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Modlin (WMI/EPMO) — CRIT: fog; snow; runway contamination risk (drivers: runway visual range (RVR) constraints, runway contamination / reduced braking, cold-temperature performance penalties) | Olsztyn-Mazury (SZY/EPSY) — CRIT: freezing fog; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: low-visibility procedures (reduced capacity), runway visual range (RVR) constraints, approach minima limits) and 5 others. Changed since last run: Almaty (ALA/UAAA).
